span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vt. 乱涂，潦草地写： to write or draw awkwardly, hastily, or carelessly
【例】 scrawled a quick note, stuck it in their mailbox, and hurried off 草草写了张便条，塞进他们的信箱然后匆匆跑了
【近】 scratch, squiggle
【反】 write carefully 仔细地写

【记】 s 音：写 + crawl 爬，字写得象狗爬一样；scribe + crawl 写字象爬
